meanings.sent1: Her logorrheas during the meeting made it hard to focus.
meanings.sent2: His logorrheas at the party annoyed everyone around him.
meanings.sent3: The logorrheas of the chatty parrot entertained the guests.
meanings.sent4: The logorrheas of the waterfall filled the valley with sound.
meanings.sent5: The logorrheas of the radio host kept listeners engaged for hours.

meanings.definition: The condition of having an uncontrollable urge to speak.
meanings.sent1: His logorrheas in class often got him in trouble.
meanings.sent2: The logorrheas of the politician led to many speeches.
meanings.sent3: The logorrheas of the shy child surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The logorrheas of the engine signaled a problem.
meanings.sent5: The logorrheas of the auctioneer set a fast pace for the event.
